name: Halo's Mixtape
summary:
HALO'S MIXTAPE:
A SHORT STORY BY MOGA
ABOUT KEEPING WARM WHEN
IT GETS REALLY COLD.

Made for the RMN Game Chill 2013-
contains hockey, bing crosby, and a dinner party!

This is a very, very short winter story about
the Witch of the Isle, who protects a Orb that
many seek to try to claim.

Recently someone has broken into her Dungeon
unbeknowst to her, and stolen a precious something!
info:
